message.content:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's a sample healthy meal plan for today:

Breakfast:
- 2 eggs scrambled with vegetables (such as bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes)
- 1 slice of whole grain toast
- 1 cup of fruit salad (a mix of berries, melons, and citrus fruits)
- 1 glass of water or green tea

Snack:
- A handful of nuts (such as almonds, walnuts, or pecans)
- A piece of fresh fruit
- A small glass of Greek yogurt with berries

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast or fish fillet with a side salad (mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots)
- 1 cup of brown rice or quinoa
- Steamed vegetables (such as broccoli, zucchini, and green beans)
- A glass of water or herbal tea

Snack:
- Hummus with whole grain crackers or carrots
- Fresh fruit salad

Dinner:
- Grilled vegetable stir-fry (such as bell peppers, onions, zucchini, and mushrooms) with tofu or tempeh
- 1 cup of brown rice or quinoa
- Steamed broccoli or green beans
- A glass of water or herbal tea

This meal plan provides a balance of protein, carbohydrates, and healthy fats, as well as plenty of vitamins and minerals from whole foods. Feel free to adjust the portions and ingredients according to your preferences and dietary needs. Enjoy your meal!
